Amphibious - Can breath air and water. Mucus Cloud - While Underwater, Probing Telepathy, 3/Day Enslave
Has prepared Cleric spells - Light, Sacred Flame, Bless, Cure Wounds, Sanctuary, Thaumaturgy.
Air Form - Can move through spaces as narrow as 1 inch.
See pg. 281 of MM.
Multi Attack - Immune - Poison, Psychic, Blind, Charm, Paralyze, Petrify, Freight. Bindsight - Cannot see beyond 60ft.
Acid Spray - Spit acid 30ft long, 5 ft wide, everyone hit must ake a DC13 Dex save taking 3d6 on failed half on saved
Multiattack - Can attack with both fists in 1 turn.
Magic Resistance. Spellcasting - 18th Level wizard spells.
Assasinate - During 1st turn assasin has advantage on rolls against anyone who hasn’t taken a turn, hits are critical. Evasion - All succeded Dex checks nulify all damage. Sneak Attack.
False Appearance - While motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal shrub.
False Appearance - While motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal shrub.
Flightless - Unable to fly

Heated Body - Anyone who touches or hits a melee attack within 5 feet takes 5 1d10 damage. Heated Weapons -Melee hits deal extra 3 1d6 + the attack. Illumination - Sheds bright light in 10 foot radius and sim light 10 additional feet.
Pack Tactics - Advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the baboon's allies is within 5 feet and ally is incapacitated.
Keen Smell - Has advantage on wisdom checks that rely on smell.

Death Throes - When Balor dies it explodeds and everyone within 30 ft must make a DC20 Dex saving, taking 70 20d6 fire damage on fail save. Half on success. Fire Aura - At start of each turn anyone within 5 feet takes 10 3d6 fire damage. Magic Resistance. Magic Weapons - All attacks are magical.
Usually found in a group with a Bandit Captain.
Parry - Add 2AC against 1 melee attack that would hit.
Devil's Sight - Magical darkness immune. Magic Resistance. Steadfast - Cannot be frightened.
Petrifying Gaze - If in line of sight and looking at eachother, DC 12 con saving throw turn to stone reapeat each turn. Can self petrify if it sees a reflection.
Echolocation - Cannot use sight while deafened. Keen Hearing - Has advantage on WIS checks with hearing.
Barbed Hide - Start of each turn deal 1d10 piercing if grappled. Devil's Sight - Magical darkness immune. Magic Resistance.
Multiattack, Constrict - Melee attack +10 and grapple, Lightning Breath - 20ft long 5 ft wide bolt dealing 12d10 DC16 DEX save halves.
Reckless - Gain advantage on all melee attacks, and against it.

Keen Sight - Advantage on WIS check with sight. Pack Tactics - Advantage on all attack rolls if at least 2 hawks are present.

Elemental Demise - If Efeeti dies his body disintegrates in a flash leaving behind only equipment. Innate Spellcasting - Spell save DC15 CHA +7 to hit can cast; detect magic, enlarge/reduce, tongues, conjoure elemental (fire), gaseous form, major image, plane shift, wall of fire.
